about_the_game:
Fizzy Friends: A Cartoon Multiplayer Physics Sandbox Game



Welcome to Fizzy Friends, where everyone has their own physical space to unleash creativity and enjoy the fun of interacting with friends.

Join the Community and Shape the Future

We hope you'll join our community and become a part of Fizzy Friends. Not only can you participate in the game and provide feedback and suggestions, but it's also a community that loves to share creative ideas. In our Discord community, you’re not just a player, but a creator. Your suggestions and ideas will directly influence the game's development.

What Kind of Game Is This?


Fizzy Friends is inspired by: that day when GMod and Fortnite got drunk together and merged.

Customize Your Space and Invite Friends to Your Creative Playground

In Fizzy Friends, you can transform your space and challenge other players within it. From simple to complex, imagination is the only limit. When you’re tired of building, you can always pick up a weapon and engage in an intense shooting battle with friends.

Combine Everyday Items to Create Your Space

We’ve added basic elements: toys, guns, vehicle parts, and various everyday objects, all powered by our crazy physics engine. As we grow, we expect changes from small improvements to major overhauls, all aimed at creating a fun multiplayer interactive sandbox game.

Diverse Game Modes

Besides the free build mode, we offer various fun game modes, including team battles, survival mode, and crown mode. Whether you prefer cooperation or competition, you'll find your fun in Fizzy Friends!

Features of Fizzy Friends:

    [] Fun and varied content that feels familiar, such as toy trains, balancing stones, building blocks, weight cubes, and other real-life items[] A wide variety of tools to equip in your quick-access bar, including guns, tools to manipulate objects, and some with bizarre effects[] Interactive objects and devices that respond to player interactions and changes in space in various ways[] Free Build Mode: Create your space in an unlimited creative environment[] Diverse Weapons: Choose from traditional firearms to creatively designed explosives for thrilling shootouts[] Various Game Modes: Team battles, survival mode, demolition mode, and more to meet the needs of different players
  • Community-Driven Development: Join our Discord community to communicate directly with developers and help create a better game

Fizzy Friends is still in development, but we can’t wait to show and share it with everyone.
We will continue to update the game in the future, introducing more weapons, levels, and game modes to enrich your gaming experience.

Join Fizzy Friends and Create and Challenge Together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements might change in the future
